title: Profile Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user in on My Profile page

Relevant links:
[Home - Personalized welcome message](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9826 )
* Android - [BPA-6459](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6459 )
* iOS - [BP-9342](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9342 )
custom_steps: WHEN Accessing Profile page via Home tab
custom_expected: THEN Profile page display

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on the Profile icon from Home Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown 'My Profile' as the header
THEN the user is shown Inbox icon in upper right corner

*requires iOS >= 11.5.0, ANDROID >= 12.0.0
THEN My Profile card is shown with Avatar(initials), Name, Email, Edit button
AND My Profile card has the Team Color/Logo shown as background (gray w/o logo for user w/out fave team)

THEN the user is shown 'My History' card layered atop the profile card with the User's (check ins) from their My History data:
* Total Check-Ins - dash('-') shown if no prev check-ins exist
* Total Teams Seen - dash('-') shown if no prev check-ins exist 
* Total Ballparks Visited - dash('-') shown if no prev check-ins exist 
* 'View Details' blue text link navigating user to My History 

NOTE: If history data is unavailable display dashes for history counts. User is still able to navigate to My History

THEN the user is shown links to settings items with icons displayed next to each row
* My Teams
* My Notifications
* My MLB Account Emails
* My Ticket Accounts

IF User enrolled to GAE then MLB Go-Ahead ID also display
THEN the user is shown 'Log Out' button below list items

title: Inbox Icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1 or greater)
AND Inbox Feature is turned on (i.e. enable_inbox is enabled in Remote Config)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has an unread message in their inbox 
(if needing a new unread message, can send to account via Club Tools - Notifications Manager 
https://qa-clubtools.us-central1.mobiletools-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/notifications)
custom_steps: WHEN accessing Profile page via Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN the Profile page display
AND the below Inbox Unread Message functionality is expected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Profile page with unread message
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Inbox icon will have an indicator dot in the top right that is Ballpark blue, regardless if any favorite team is specified OR no favorite team specified. (Ballpark 10.1.0 requirement)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the use taps all the unread messages
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Inbox icon will no longer have an indicator dot in the top right that is Ballpark blue, regardless if any favorite team is specified OR no favorite team specified.

title: Profile - Edit Mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (11.5.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app

Relevant links:
*Mocks:[Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/M3vqmrFe2eJlofe392hAqY/Specs?node-id=1284%3A14013)
EDIT MODE:
*iOS:[BP-9188](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9188)

custom_steps:
WHEN user is on Profile view 
AND User tap on Edit button 

*iOS: standard icon - Pencil in Circle
custom_expected:
THEN user will be taken to the First/ Last name edit form 

Design: 
Title: Edit Profile in Center 
X icon top left 
ANDROID: 
Back Navigation arrow on Top Left follow with
Profile Edit 


User avatar initials as First Name / Last name initials 
First Name field 
Last Name field 
Submit CTA (filled with blue color and White text color)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on edit form 
AND user removes all the characters the First name field
AND user navigates to the Last name field
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the error text "First name is required."

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on edit form 
AND user removes all the characters the Last name field
AND user navigates to the First name field
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the error text "Last name is required."

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on edit form 
AND user types more than 40 characters in the First name field
AND user navigates to the Last name field
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the error text "First Name must be 40 characters or less"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on edit form 
AND user types more than 40 characters in the Last name field
AND user navigates to the First name field
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the error text "Last Name must be 40 characters or less"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enter valid First name and Last name 
AND tap on Save (Submit as it shows in design)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will see the saving animation
AND user will be taken back to Profile view
AND user will be able to see my recently modified name updated

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enter valid First name and Last name with multiple names (i.e Vlad Guerrero Jr., Michael Harris II, Isiah Kiner-Falefa)
AND tap on Save (Submit as it shows in design)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will see the saving animation
AND user will be taken back to Profile view
AND user will be able to see my recently modified name updated
AND user will see the first initials shown of first/last name in the avatar

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on edit form AND makes changes to the name fields 
BUT user taps on 'X' to dismiss

ANDROID: User display with Back navigation arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[iOS]
THEN user will be taken back to Profile view
AND User will be able to see the names NOT updated

[ANDROID]
THEN user is shown 'Discard Changes? Your profile changes have not been saved.' w/ 'Keep Editing' and 'Discard' CTA
AND User will be able to discard the changes OR keep editing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enters valid and different First name and/or Last name 
AND tap on Save (Submit as it shows in design) 
AND user quit the app, and restarts the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user updated data for profile name should be maintained

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enters valid and different First name and/or Last name 
AND tap on Save (Submit as it shows in design) 
AND user log out of the app and log back in
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user updated data for profile name should be maintained

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user have no network connection*
AND user enters valid and different First name and/or Last name 
AND tap on Save (Submit as it shows in design) 


*device set to airplane mode can be done to simulate
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the error text “Sorry, check your network and try again."

ANDROID: Network Error message Modal
Header: “Unable to Save” 

Body: “Sorry, check your network and try again”

Buttons: “Dismiss” “Retry”

title: Profile - Edit Mode [External-Proxy]*
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (11.5.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app

Relevant links:
*Mocks:[Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/M3vqmrFe2eJlofe392hAqY/Specs?node-id=1284%3A14013)
EDIT MODE:
*iOS:[BP-9188](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9188)
*Android:[BPA-6461](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6461)
custom_steps:
WHEN user is on Profile view 
AND User tap on Edit button 

*iOS: standard icon - Pencil in Circle

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN profile service unavailable* 
AND user Taps on Save (Submit as it shows in design) 

*this can be simulated with proxy tool by adding a breakpoint to https://profile.mlb.com request
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will see the saving animation
BUT then user is eventually shown(after timeout) the error text 'The request timed out.'
AND the user changes have NOT been updated (can be verified by returning to My Profile)

ANDROID: Network Error message

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user successfully changes to the First Name and Last Name within BP Profile > Edit
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be able to verify the changes by Logging into MLB.com* or through proxy**

*https://www.mlb.com/account/general can be used to verify the acct name change occurs
**proxy call would be https://profile.mlb.com/api/v1/profile

custom_steps_separated.content:
(reversely)
WHEN user makes a name change externally (i.e MLB.com) or through mocked proxy**
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be able to see updated profile name on BP app

NOTE: The update will be reflected in BP, only after the Identity Token has been refreshed. This can take up to 24hrs to occur organically, but can also be force via logout/login.

title: My Account - Email Verification Status
custom_preconds:

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN: The verified section will not be displayed

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN: The pending section will not be displayed

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN: The list of pending secondary emails are displayed along with a resend button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN: Email address is too long to fit in primary status area or in the verified & pending list items
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN: The size of the font is reduced and ellipses added to prevent overlap with checkmark or resend button

AND enable_history_personalization is set to 'true' in remote config for desired environment
custom_expected:
THEN My Profile card is shown with Avatar, Name, Edit button, First Check-in
AND My Profile card has the Team Color shown as background (gray for no team)
AND My History summary shown, with counts, labels and a link('View Details') directing to My History page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on the Profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is shown a personalized profile card with the following:
* avatar image - a placeholder avatar for users without a photo
* fan's name - if available (wrap to second line with long last name)
** if name is unavailable, 'Your Name' is shown
* first check-in year - if customer has a prev check-in
** label is hidden, if no prev check-ins exist
* Background as favorite team primary color -- Ballpark grey if no favorite team is selected (#f8f8f8)
* Edit button icon

AND the user is shown 'My History' card layered atop the profile card with the User's (check ins) from their My History data:
* Total Check-Ins - dash('-') shown if no prev check-ins exist
* Total Teams Seen - dash('-') shown if no prev check-ins exist 
* Total Ballpark Visited - dash('-') shown if no prev check-ins exist 
* 'View Details' blue text link navigating user to My History 

NOTE: If history data is unavailable display dashes for history counts. User is still able to navigate to My History

AND the user is shown links to settings items with icons displayed next to each row
* My Teams
* My Notifications
* My MLB Account Emails
* My Ticket Accounts
AND the user is shown 'Log Out' button below list items

* Check-Ins shown is incremented by '1' since a historic check-in has been added
* Teams Seen shown may increase by 0, 1, or 2, depending if prev team(s) were newly added with the historic check-in recently added
* Ballparks Visited may increase by 0 or 1, depending if prev ballpark is newly added with the historic check-in recently added 
* 'View Details' blue text link navigating user to My History

custom_steps_separated.content:
When user is on 'My Profile' page
AND user has NO prev check-in
AND user adds a LIVE check-in
AND user revisit's My Profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[PERSONALIZATION CURRENTLY DISABLED - SKIP TO NEXT VALIDATION]

THEN within Profile card and underneath the user's name, the 'First Check In:' label is displayed followed by the year of check-in just entered. (current year)

[Valid when enable_history_personalization => true. If personalization value is false, SKIP this validation step]

AND the user is shown 'My History' card layered atop the profile card with the User's (check-ins) from their My History data:
* Check-Ins shown as '1' since a check-in has been added
* Teams Seen shown as '2' since a check-in has been added
* Ballparks Visited shown as '1' since a check-in has been added **
* 'View Details' blue text link navigating user to My History

(** note: Spring Training stadiums do NOT currently increment the count for Ballparks visited and therefore would show '0', if ST game checked-in)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When user is on 'My Profile' page
AND user has a prev check-in
AND user removes all check-ins
AND user revisit's My Profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[PERSONALIZATION CURRENTLY DISABLED - SKIP TO NEXT VALIDATION]

THEN within Profile card and underneath the user's name, the 'First Check In:' label and year is NOT displayed.

[Valid when enable_history_personalization => true. If personalization value is false, SKIP this validation step]

AND the user is shown 'My History' card layered atop the profile card with the User's (check-ins) from their My History data:
* Check-Ins shown as dash('-') since no prev check-ins exist
* Teams Seen shown as dash('-') since no prev check-ins exist
* Ballparks Visited shown as dash('-') since no prev check-ins exist
* 'View Details' blue text link navigating user to My History

title: Profile Page [Personalization ON] - FUTURE RELEASE
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: Profile configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "enable_history_profile" as true
3. Edit "enable_history_personalization" as true
4. Save changes.
5. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform/target_audience)


GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.3.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user in on My Profile page

Relevant links:
* Android - [BPA-6120](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6120) / [BPA-6121](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6121)
* iOS - [BP-9187](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9187) / [BP-9165](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9165)
* Mocks - [Profile Filled](https://app.zeplin.io/project/602160fce3c37f64b50c8127/screen/609bf34736e7cfab96fb89c3) / [Profile Filled Long](https://app.zeplin.io/project/602160fce3c37f64b50c8127/screen/609bf348ec00cbbe5d0c9121) / [Profile Option](https://app.zeplin.io/project/602160fce3c37f64b50c8127/screen/609bf349ba4ba7acbbfc7b84)
custom_steps: WHEN Accessing Profile page via Home tab
custom_expected: THEN Profile page display and behavior is identical regardless of point of entry

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on the Profile icon from Home Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown 'My Profile' as the header
THEN the user is shown Inbox icon in upper right corner

THEN the user is shown a personalized profile card with the following:
* avatar image - a placeholder avatar for users without a photo
* fan's name - if available (wrap to second line with long last name)
    ** if name is unavailable, 'Your Name' is shown
* first check-in year - if customer has a prev check-in
    ** label is hidden, if no prev check-ins exist
* Background as favorite team primary color -- Ballpark grey if no favorite team is selected (#f8f8f8)
* Edit button icon

THEN the user is shown 'My History' card layered atop the profile card with the User's (check ins) from their My History data:
* Total Check-Ins - dash('-') shown if no prev check-ins exist
* Total Teams Seen - dash('-') shown if no prev check-ins exist 
* Total Ballpark Visited - dash('-') shown if no prev check-ins exist 
* 'View Details' blue text link navigating user to My History 

NOTE: If history data is unavailable display dashes for history counts. User is still able to navigate to My History

THEN the user is shown links to settings items with icons displayed next to each row
* My Teams
* My Notifications
* My MLB Account Emails
* My Ticket Accounts
THEN the user is shown 'Log Out' button below list items
